titleStmt.title: The sufficiency of the spirits teaching without humane learning a treatise tending to prove humane learning to be no help to the spirituall understanding of the word of God ... / by Samuel How.
titleStmt.author: How, Samuel.
Kiffin, William, 1616-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Newly printed, and are to be sold by William Larnar,

notesStmt.note: "Seen, allowed, and first printed by some friends of the author, 1639."
Postscript by William Kyffen [1] p. at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
